definition: genre of song-and-dance duet popular in northeast China
two/2/(Beijing dialect) stupid
man/person/people/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]
see 轉文|转文[zhuai3 wen2]
to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)

sentences.english: If you are comfortable with that, then you can decree whatever you want to decree .
sentences.chinese: 如果你是满意的，二人转，那么你可以令你想做法令。

sentences.english: Heishan county is the cradle of Errenzhuan, which has more than two hundred years of history.
sentences.chinese: 黑山县是二人转的发祥地，有着二百多年的历史。

sentences.english: The essential characteristics of Couple Dance Opera is the carnival of the common people.
sentences.chinese: 二人转的本质特征是平民的狂欢性。

sentences.english: I am just an ordinary actor.
sentences.chinese: 我只是一个普通的二人转演员。

sentences.english: Song- and- Dance Duet is a civil art in northeast which farmers like it deeply.
sentences.chinese: 二人转是深受东北农民喜爱的一种民间艺术。

sentences.english: Song- and- Dance Duet is a civil art of Northeast where farmers like it deeply.
sentences.chinese: 二人转是深受东北农民喜爱的一种民间艺术。

sentences.english: The second chapter examines the cultural characteristics of song and dance duet.
sentences.chinese: 第二章则考察了二人转的文化特征。

sentences.english: The art of singing is one main means to attract and infect the audience.
sentences.chinese: “唱功”是二人转艺术感染观众的主要手段。

sentences.english: I am just an ordinary actor of "two person act".
sentences.chinese: 我只是一个普通的二人转演员。

sentences.english: The Global Times article also pointed to criticism of a cross-dressing comedian, Xiao Shenyang.
sentences.chinese: 《环球时报》的文章也对小沈阳的二人转提出了批评。

sentences.english: The er ren zhuan, or two-person skit, has gained in popularly among the Chinese recently.
sentences.chinese: 最近，二人转已为中国老百姓所喜闻乐见。

definition: comic dialogue/sketch/crosstalk
folk musical theater
comic crosstalk/formalized comic dialogue between two stand-up comics: funny man 逗哏[dou4 gen2] and straight man 捧哏[peng3 gen2]
short, simple literary or artistic creation/essay/skit
popular comedian/comic star
Zhao Benshan (1958-), universally known PRC TV comedian
acrobatics/CL:場|场[chang3]
genre of folk song with accompaniment of bamboo clappers
funny man (lead role in comic dialogue 對口相聲|对口相声[dui4 kou3 xiang4 sheng1])/to joke/to play the fool/to provoke laughter
straight man (supporting role in comic dialogue 對口相聲|对口相声[dui4 kou3 xiang4 sheng1])/to react with exasperation to the silliness of the funny man 逗哏[dou4 gen2]
local Chinese opera, such as Shaoxing opera 越劇|越剧[Yue4 ju4], Sichuan opera 川劇|川剧[Chuan1 ju4], Henan opera 豫劇|豫剧[Yu4 ju4] etc
comic monologue/one-person comic sketch
speaking and singing, as in various forms of storytelling such as 彈詞|弹词[tan2 ci2] and 相聲|相声[xiang4 sheng5]/(music) rapping
play/show/performance/exhibition/to perform/to act/to demonstrate/CL:場|场[chang3]
Chinese opera
Yangge, a popular rural folk dance
